name: Stylish Notification Popup
author: Shrinivas Naik

sections.description:
Stylish Notification Popup is a responsive popup plugin for wordpress to show attention grabbing message to your visitors with call to action button and customization options.

Here are some cool features of Stylish Notification Popup plugin

  • Responsive design
  • Cool in and out animation effects
  • Call to action button
  • Clean and light weight
  • Easy to use admin panel

Upgrade to Pro and get the following features

  • WYSIWYG editor to enter your message in the backend with media upload Button
  • Customization options to change font size, popup color, button color, button hover color
  • You can set popup delay and Show Every X Day(s) option to avoid disturbance to your visitor

Get the Pro Version Now!

Check out Stylish Notification Popup homepage for screenshot and more information.

Useful Resources for Web Developers [Our Other Projects]

  • Multi Device Website Mockup Generator
  • Blog Title Generator

Credits
* Animate.css
* Google Fonts
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Compatible with WordPress 4.7
  • Removed optional backlink
  • Readme update

1.0

  • Initial release of Stylish Notification Popup plugin
